summary: Completed comprehensive testing of coach dashboard integration into client app. Login flow works correctly, dashboard functionality is fully operational when authenticated, but authentication state persistence has some issues between browser sessions. All core features including navigation, search, and UI components are working properly.

integration_issues.issue: Authentication state does not persist properly between browser sessions - user gets redirected to onboarding when directly accessing /dashboard in new session

passed_tests: Unauthenticated access to /dashboard correctly redirects to /onboarding
Coach link in header is visible and properly styled with border and icon
Login flow works correctly - user can enter email and get authenticated
Login page has proper email input field and submit button functionality
Authentication callback (/auth) processes login and redirects to home
After successful login, user is redirected to home page with proper layout
Authenticated users can access dashboard via Coach link in header
Dashboard home page loads with stats cards (3 Videos, 2 Active Challenges, 156 Members, 12 Live Classes)
Dashboard displays proper sidebar layout with navigation links
Dashboard quick actions section shows Upload Video, Create Challenge, Schedule Live Class buttons
Dashboard recent content sections display Recent Videos and Recent Challenges with mock data
Videos page at /dashboard/videos loads with proper header and search functionality
Videos page displays list of videos with search input field
Videos page search functionality works (can type and filter)
Challenges page at /dashboard/challenges loads with proper header and search functionality
Challenges page displays list of challenges with search input field
Challenges page search functionality works (can type and filter)
Challenge status indicators are displayed with proper styling
Dashboard sidebar navigation between Videos and Challenges pages works correctly
All dashboard quick action buttons (Upload Video, Create Challenge, Schedule Live Class) are clickable and enabled
Dashboard uses proper layout with fixed sidebar (ml-64) and main content area
Mock API integration works correctly for videos and challenges data
Dashboard loading states are handled properly with loading indicators
action_item_for_main_agent: Fix authentication state persistence issue - users should remain authenticated when directly accessing /dashboard in new browser sessions. The AuthContext localStorage check may need improvement or the token validation needs to be more robust.
